quick_summary: Create reusable template system for project recovery files (anti-compaction protection). Enables any multi-phase project to generate comprehensive plan + recovery JSON + start here guide in <5 min, preventing project drift and context loss.
problem: Currently, project recovery protection must be manually created for each project (30+ min). Phase 119 proved the value of 3-layer recovery, but pattern not reusable.
solution: Build template system with generator script that auto-creates recovery files for any project in <5 min. Integrate with save state as Phase 0.
